{"id":"7b224faa-76e9-4223-9d58-8a82b920e167","name":"[TextContent(type=text, text=<user_query>
Đọc project tạo github page cho tôi
thiết kế hoàn chỉnh có phần thanh bên trái về release note bên phải là các thay đổi nhìn cho chuyên nghiệp
7.32.0. Update event impression + revenue
Release vesion 7.32.0

7.31.2 - Update Billing SDK to lastest. (8.0.0)
- Remove Vungle(Liff off) + Pangle Mediation (optional)
implementation 'com.google.android.gms:play-services-ads:24.4.0' implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:facebook:6.20.0.0'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:adcolony:4.8.0.2'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:applovin:13.2.0.1'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:vungle:7.5.0.0'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:mintegral:16.9.71.0'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:pangle:7.1.0.8.0'
 implementation("com.unity3d.ads:unity-ads:4.14.2")
 implementation("com.google.ads.mediation:unity:4.14.2.0") implementation 'com.applovin:applovin-sdk:13.2.0' implementation 'com.bigossp:bigo-ads:5.3.0'
 implementation 'com.bigossp:max-mediation:5.3.0.0'
 implementation 'com.applovin.mediation:mintegral-adapter:16.9.71.0' implementation 'com.adjust.sdk:adjust-android:5.4.0' implementation 'com.facebook.android:facebook-android-sdk:18.0.3' implementation 'com.appsflyer:af-android-sdk:6.17.0'

	Note: If not remove pangle or liftoff, pls add dependency for build.gradle app		 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:vungle:7.5.0.0'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:pangle:7.1.0.8.0'
7.23.0- Remove Vungle(Liff off) + Pangle Mediation  implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:vungle:7.5.0.0'- implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:pangle:7.1.0.8.0'7.21.0- Remove Vungle(Liff off) Mediation  implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:vungle:7.5.0.0'7.20.0- Update Admob version 24.3.0 & mediation admob to lastest
implementation 'com.google.android.gms:play-services-ads:24.3.0' implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:facebook:6.20.0.0'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:adcolony:4.8.0.2'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:applovin:13.2.0.1'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:vungle:7.5.0.0'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:mintegral:16.9.71.0'
 implementation 'com.google.ads.mediation:pangle:7.1.0.8.0'
 implementation("com.unity3d.ads:unity-ads:4.14.2")
 implementation("com.google.ads.mediation:unity:4.14.2.0") implementation 'com.applovin:applovin-sdk:13.2.0' implementation 'com.bigossp:bigo-ads:5.3.0'
 implementation 'com.bigossp:max-mediation:5.3.0.0'
 implementation 'com.applovin.mediation:mintegral-adapter:16.9.71.0' implementation 'com.adjust.sdk:adjust-android:5.4.0' implementation 'com.facebook.android:facebook-android-sdk:18.0.3' implementation 'com.appsflyer:af-android-sdk:6.17.0'
7.11.2-RC- Release candidate version 7.11.27.11.1-snapshot- Add keyword for admob7.9.2
Disable tracking IAP Appsflyer to fix crash
Fixed bug Provider Admob not showing AppOpen 

7.9.1- Upgrade version Appsflyer
Code sample to setup Appsflyer
...
 AppsflyerConfig appsflyerConfig = new AppsflyerConfig(true, APPSFLYER_DEV_KEY);
 aperoAdConfig.setAppsflyerConfig(appsflyerConfig);

7.6.9- Fixed native preload await both not working- Update max mediation- Make open function getPreloadAdNative for NativeAdHelper7.6.7
Add banner new config with preload banner
7.5.4
add option show ad interstitial for ad resume
Apply NativeAdReloadByTimeUseCase 
Update add condition nativeAdHelper.flagUserEnableReload for reload by time usecase
7.5.1
Tracking install referrer
7.5.0
Migrate adjust sdk v4 to v5
7.4.9
Update Log for Tester with tag "FOR_TESTER"
7.4.8
Update Log for Tester with tag "FOR_TESTER"
Change logic wait native preload with suspend function guardUntilLoadingComplete.
Add saver preload when wait until no ad in queue -> preload.
7.4.7
Not request ads when previous request not finish , log more id when load fail
Update facebook mediation 6.18.0.0
7.4.6
Merge pull request #224 from AperoVN/kohuyn/add-callback-click-ad
Add global callback for onAdClicked
7.4.5
Handle interstitial in InterstitialAdManager with optional timeout
7.4.4
Fixed bug NativeHighFloor NullPointerException in constructor by
7.4.3-alpha03
Fix logic load native, preload native in Provider MAX
Add callback impression in func load inter splash
7.4.3
public fun isAppResumeEnabled in AppOpenMax.java
Sep 20
7.4.2-alpha
disable event meta: paid_ad_impression - paid_ad_impression_value
(not apply to develop)
Sep 18
7.4.1
Remote layoutId from Preload by @cuongapero in #218
Remove function not use, can make it wrong logic by @cuongapero in #220
</user_query>)]","timestamp":1752742551914,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"<user_query>
